## CCSelectorCombinedProps.filterOptions property

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Custom options for setting how the select options are filtered based on the input. See [https://mui.com/material-ui/api/autocomplete/\#autocomplete-prop-filterOptions](https://mui.com/material-ui/api/autocomplete/#autocomplete-prop-filterOptions) and [https://mui.com/material-ui/react-autocomplete/\#custom-filter](https://mui.com/material-ui/react-autocomplete/#custom-filter) for more information about custom filtering.

**Signature:**

```typescript
filterOptions?: (options: CountryType[], state: FilterOptionsState<CountryType>) => CountryType[];
```
